level1: The current system we have has left 30 million Americans uninsured or underinsured, and people who do have insurance could bankrupt themselves trying to pay thei medical bills. We need Medicare for All!
It was a right wing plan. It's time for single payer.
Obamacare exchanges cover about 10 million Americans, Medicare covers about 60 million Americans. Improving and expanding Medicare to everyone is not "starting over."
